strength.name: Strength
strength.description: Measures bodily power, athletic training, and the extent to which you can exert raw physical force.

constitution.name: Constitution
constitution.description: Measures health, stamina, and vital force.

intelligence.name: Intelligence
intelligence.description: Measures reasoning ability, memory, and analytical thinking.

wisdom.name: Wisdom
wisdom.description: Reflects how attuned you are to the world around you and represents perceptiveness and intuition.

charisma.name: Charisma
charisma.description: Measures your ability to interact effectively with others.
